channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Railway Walks with Julia Bradbury
channel.desc: Julia Bradbury embarks on a series of walks following Britain's lost rail empire, beginning in Derbyshire at the heart of the Peak District on the Monsal Trail.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: The Many Faces of June Whitfield
channel.desc: Comedy actress June Whitfield tells her own story, from her early days in the West End working with Noel Coward to her comedy performances on radio and TV.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Happy Ever After
channel.desc: Pilot programme of the classic sitcom Happy Ever After, starring Terry Scott and June Whitfield as a couple adjusting to life alone after their children have flown the nest.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Beggar My Neighbour
channel.desc: The 1960s BBC sitcom about warring relatives and neighbours, starring Peter Jones, June Whitfield, Reg Varney and Pat Coombs.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.desc: During the First World War, two soldiers must cross no-man's-land to deliver a message. Contains some strong language, some violence and some upsetting scenes.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: DANGER! Cornelia Parker - imagine
channel.desc: Alan Yentob follows sculptor Cornelia Parker's creative process in a film that sees her delve deep into America's history, cinema and art, as well as her own personal past.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Inside Museums
channel.desc: Diana Ali revisits the Whitworth art gallery in Manchester to explore an eclectic collection that helped inspire her as an artist.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Railway Walks with Julia Bradbury
channel.desc: Julia Bradbury embarks on a series of walks following Britain's lost rail empire, beginning in Derbyshire at the heart of the Peak District on the Monsal Trail.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: A Slow Odyssey
channel.desc: Documentary following a white-tailed eagle as it flies around Scotland's west coast.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Earth's Seasonal Secrets
channel.desc: Andrew Scott narrates a programme celebrating the glorious nature of summer on earth and the extraordinary ways animals and plants rise to the challenges it brings.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Inside Museums
channel.desc: Kelvingrove Art Gallery and Museum is a place artist Lachlan Goudie has loved since he was a boy. He explores Glasgow's most popular cultural jewel, home to thousands of treasures.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Railway Walks with Julia Bradbury
channel.desc: Julia Bradbury continues her series of walks along Britain's lost rail empire as she visits the Mawddach estuary in north Wales, a beautiful part of Snowdonia.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: The Secret Life of the Sun
channel.desc: Kate Humble and Helen Czerski reveal the inner workings of the sun and investigate why scientists think changes in the sun's behaviour may have powerful effects on our climate.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Hunt for the Oldest DNA
channel.desc: Film following a team of scientists in their dramatic quest to recover DNA that is millions of years old and reveal a lost world from before the last Ice Age.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Graham Reid Remembers... The Precious Blood
channel.desc: Writer Graham Reid looks back on his 1996 BBC drama The Precious Blood, set in a Belfast trying to secure a lasting peace and starring Amanda Burton and Kevin McNally.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: The Precious Blood - Screen Two
channel.desc: Drama set in Belfast that asks if it is possible to have peace with justice. Contains some strong language, some violence and some upsetting scenes.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Graham Reid Remembers... Life After Life
channel.desc: Playwright Graham Reid looks back on his 1995 TV drama Life After Life, a powerful addition to his work on the Troubles, about a murderer released into ceasefire Belfast.

channel.name: BBC4 UK
channel.title: Life After Life - Screen Two
channel.desc: Leo Doyle, after serving a life sentence, tries to rekindle an affair with his ex-fiancee. Contains strong language and prolonged violent scenes.
